org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.internal

Class RunOnBoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.internal.RunOnBoot

  • public class RunOnBoot
extends BroadcastReceiver
    RunOnBoot is responsible for auto-starting the robot controller app when a headless device boots.

      • noteDragonboardPresenceAndExitIfNoRC

        protected void noteDragonboardPresenceAndExitIfNoRC()
        If we're on the DB/Lynx comb, then ensure that the 'isPresent' pin is in the appropriate state. Then, unless the RC is running in *this* incarnation of this broadcast receiver, get the heck out of Dodge.
